name: PUNK (Justin Crisp)
description:
PUNK: Dark Retro High School Adventure

Dive into a unique blend of influences from beloved games like Dark Cloud 2, Bully, Tony Hawk Underground, and the Soulsborne series, combined with atmospheric inspirations from iconic films and shows like The Breakfast Club, Stranger Things, Chainsaw Man, Nightmare on Elm Street, and The Labyrinth. PUNK is an early prototype action-adventure game with RPG elements, set in a gritty, dark-retro high school environment.

Immerse yourself in PUNK's captivating features, such as:

  • Engaging, Souls-like combat system
  • Biking and skating mechanics, including fun mini-games
  • Experience high school life with a dynamic calendar and class system
  • Forge friendships or rivalries through a deep relationship system
  • Explore "The Darkside" with its thrilling dungeons, cookies, and monsters!
  • Traverse a dense, open map that keeps you hooked (though not quite a full world)

Please note that the following elements are unlikely to be included at launch:

  • A complete main story
  • Fully-fledged RPG system (talent classes, etc.)
  • Access to all building interiors
  • A comprehensive cast of characters
  • More than one or two classes

Thank you for checking out PUNK! If you're interested in contributing or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. We'd love to hear from you!
